data.title: New Vendor Discovery
data.description: IT supplier controls most of the IT and want to know what is out there.

data.title: Future Proofing
data.description: Do not have a 5-year IT plan.

data.title: Efficient Automation
data.description: Inefficient systems and manual systems in place when competitors have digitised them.

data.title: Data Based Decisions
data.description: No visibility and proper intelligence using data.

data.title: Scale Leaders
data.description: Finding IT Project Management capabilities to manage medium or large IT projects

data.title: Hiring Top Leadership
data.description: Finding a part time CIO or IT manager.

data.title: Defining IT Needs
data.description: Can't document the business requirements for a new system.

data.title: Disaster Recovery
data.description: Does not have business continuity or IT disaster recovery in place.

data.title: Due Diligence
data.description: Struggling performing an IT due diligence prior to a merger.
